#summary Release notes for the Game.

= Version 0.94.190 - More missions =
  * Released: 2012-02-10 14:00 CET
  * Added missions 13 and 16
  * Reduced population loss due space and ground battles (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=254 #254], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=279 #279]) 
  * Added subtitles to Achilles-Check message ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=276 Issue #276])
  * Fixed label for police station unit of measure ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=280 Issue #280])
  * Fleets on the starmap now move smoother ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=273 Issue #273])
  * Attack notification improvements ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=281 Issue #281])
  * Barracks had incorrect space health ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=283 Issue #283])
  * Fixed achievement "Defense contract" ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=285 Issue #285])
  * Fixed Map Editor initialization crash ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=286 Issue #286])
  * Fixed mission 12 stages and completion not triggering if the user didn't watch the briefing/debriefing messages. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=287 Issue #287])
  * Mission 6 starts immediately after promotion and your fleet is moved far away, just like in the original.

= Version 0.94.180 - Few enhancements =
  * Released: 2012-02-04 20:00 CET
  * Added Missions 12 and 14
  * Added triggers for Wife videos
  * Groundwar AI units now attack ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=277 Issue #277])
  * Corrected missing Achilles-Check video and sound ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=275 Issue #275])

= Version 0.94.160 - Fixes =
  * Released: 2012-01-29 17:00 CET
  * Fixed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=190 Issue #190], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=267 Issue #267]), auto-refill of bombs and rockets settings did not work correctly.
  * Implemented virus infection and propagation ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=125 Issue #125])
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=191 Issue #191]: audiovisual feedback if a planet can't be attacked
  * Fixed Mission 1 and consequences: Mission 5 will start only if you completed Mission 1. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=197 Issue #197])
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=109 Issue #109], ships without firepower won't respond to attack command (own and AI side inclusive)
  * Follow fleet working again and "attacks the attacker". ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=265 Issue 265])
  * Fixed Mission 3 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=209 Issue #209]), if you follow the fleet with one of your own and the attack happens, your fleet will automatically attack the pirates. If you managed to do a close escort, this will surely result in a space battle within a few seconds. 
  * Fixed issues related to Mission 8. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=242 Issue #242], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=225 Issue #225])
  * Fixed issues with Mission 9. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=244 Issue #244])
  * Fixed issues with some missions restarting once completed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=247 #247])
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=246 Issue #246], unable to create and equip new fleets.
  * Fixed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=248 Issue #246], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=255 Issue #255]), Mission 7 trader protection problems
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=260 Issue #260], fire rockets from starbases, auto-refill of starbases too
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=250 Issue #250], battle finish screen ally losses.
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=251 Issue #251], AI deployed starbases had no weapons.
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=252 Issue #252], kamikaze management and crash
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=264 Issue #264], rockets were selectable and stoppable in spacewar.
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=257 Issue #257], AI managed planets should not produce stations and vehicles in Level 1.
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=268 Issue #268], error messages on the statusbar stay longer visible.
  * Added the game option to switch the mouse left-right button interpretation
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=270 Issue #270], attack command in spacewar affected all ships, not just the selected ones.

= Version 0.93.540 - Improvements =
  * Released: 2012-01-11 21:10 CET
  * Several AI improvements and fixes
  * Ability to switch to right-click-action controls (starmap, spacewar, groundwar). If enabled, simple right click moves or attacks. Panning is done with the middle mouse button. Zoom to fit is CTRL+Middle button in this mode.
  * Grouping units in space and ground battles. Use CTRL+0 .. CTRL+9 to assign, SHIFT+0 .. SHIFT+9 to recall a group. (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=105 #105], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=106 #106])
  * Display selected unit information in the bottom-middle section of the spacewar screen. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=107 Issue #107])
  * Balance related code and model improvements (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=155 #155], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=170 #170])
  * General bug fixes (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=156 #156], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=161 #161], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=163 #163], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=165 #165], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=166 #166], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=167 #167], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=168 #168], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=169 #169], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=172 #172], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=174 #174], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=175 #175])
  * Improved rocket and bomb behavior. (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=176 #176], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=178 #178], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=179 #179])
  * Rockets and bombs can be targeted. (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=177 #177], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=182 #182])
  * Bombs fired at ground structures damages other nearby structures. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=183 Issue #183])
  * Fixed issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=171 #171] and [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=173 #173]: adding production to wrong category.
  * Changed disable order for buildings in case of worker shortage ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=164 Issue #164])
  * Water vaporator now boosts the growth instead of providing housing. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=148 Issue #148])
  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=181 issue #181]:  add more vehicles to fleets/planets than the max allowed.

= Version 0.93.530 - More AI =
  * Released: 2012-01-06 19:20 CET
  * Spacewar rockets implemented ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=131 Issue #131])
  * Groundwar minelayer controllable. Press D to deploy a mine. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=132 Issue #132])
  * Several AI fixes
  * AI now builds defensive structures, guns, shields and stations
  * AI now constructs fleets based on best available technology
  * Autobattle now working (Issues: [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=113 #113], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=154 #154])
  * Added new skirmish map: Human vs. AI. Two players, both with human technology.
  * Label fixes (Issues [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=157 #157], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=158 #158], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=159 #159])

= Version 0.93.510 - Fixes =
  * Released: 2012-01-01 01:40 CET
  * Improved AI
  * Enabled AI for all races
  * Technology fixes
  * Ability to switch players. CTRL+V shows all planets and fleets. Select an alien planet, then press CTRL+P. You can issue orders, build, research, etc.
  * Added achievements: checking, display, save into profile
  * Fixed several bugs
